title: TechArticle
description: A technical article - Example: How-to (task) topics, step-by-step, procedural troubleshooting, specifications, etc.

allOf.description: An article, such as a news article or piece of investigative report. Newspapers and magazines have articles of many different types and this is intended to cover them all.\n\nSee also [blog post](http://blog.schema.org/2014/09/schemaorg-support-for-bibliographic_2.html).

dependencies.description: Prerequisites needed to fulfill steps in article.

proficiencyLevel.description: Proficiency needed for this content; expected values: 'Beginner', 'Expert'.
